4100.name: Unknown
4100.message:
A communication error has occurred.

The wireless-signal strength may
be poor. Please make sure that
there are no obstructions between
the console and the wireless router,
and try again later.

Make sure your wireless router is set
up for use and powered on. 

Unplug your modem and wireless router
from the power outlet. Wait a little while,
plug them back in, and try again.

Make sure the Wii U console is within
range of your wireless router.

Move any electronics away from the
Wii U console and your wireless router. 

Try changing the wireless channel
within the settings of your wireless
router or network device.

If you are unable to access or change
your wireless-router or network-device
settings, please contact the
manufacturer for support.

If the problem persists, please visit
support.nintendo.com.
4100.short_solution: Make sure your console is in range of your Wi-Fi network, and check the settings are correct. Make sure the 'Default' connection in Internet Settings is set correctly.
